PEAK.phaseDescription: Immediate preparation for the big race day.

days.label: Wednesday
days.title: Long Run
days.description: Run 0 km at 7:30 min/km pace
options: Long runs are key to your marathon success

days.label: Friday
days.title: Tempo Run
days.description: Run 6 km at 6:00 min/km pace
options: Tempo runs help you run faster for longer

days.label: Saturday
days.title: Intervals
days.description: Run 6 intervals of 0.4 km at 5:30 min/km pace. Each interval is followed by 2:00 min rest at 7:00 min/km pace
options: Total distance: 2 km
Intervals help you run faster and more efficiently

days.label: Wednesday
days.title: Easy Run
days.description: Run 5 km at 7:00 min/km pace in the conditions/environment of the marathon
options: Keep it light and easy to stay fresh for the marathon

days.label: Friday
days.title: Yoga
days.description: Focus on recovery and mobility exercises
options: Enhance your flexibility and prevent injuries

days.title: Marathon
days.description: Run 42.195 km at your marathon pace
options: This is it! Give it your all and enjoy the race

TAPER.phaseDescription: Ensuring you are healthy, not injured, and well-rested for the start line.
